name: Super Card Swipers
description:
Join the epic card battle arena! Swipe as many cards as you can!

Press SPACE to play. Use WASD or arrows to move, and [] or ,. to rotate. Or use a controller. Press ESCAPE to get the mouse cursor back.

Use M to turn the music off and back on. Right click to go fullscreen.

Created for Fuck This Jam 2014.
